Description.Text: Business travelers will appreciate conveniences like the public computer with Internet access , high-speed Internet access in some rooms and access to copy, fax and secretarial services. Included in every one of the tastefully furnished rooms are irons, ironing boards and cable television. Non-smoking rooms are available. This is a pet-friendly hotel. The hotel also offers a currency exchange and VCR rentals. For added convenience, there is an on-site newsstand, a jogging track, a picnic area and a playground. The great accommodations and courteous staff make the Comfort Hotel Goettingen the perfect destination for lodging. Our professional, friendly team will cater to your every need. Come stay with us the next you visit the Goettingen area.
